text:
@marcorubio Over 5 months into the COVID-19 pandemic 
(first US case was Jan 21) we now have enough data to say with a high degree of confidence that many thousands of Americans have died from NOT wearing a mask in public, and the @GOP, haven taught this to their voters, are responsible😷=🖖

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
